borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference: 2023/00960/FUL dated 7th July 2023 for the "External refurbishment of site comprising raising of existing roof, fa√ßade improvements, partial repositioning of refuse areas, installation of solar panels, the installation of cycle parking spaces, landscaping and associated works." Amendment sought for the removal of 1no. goods door and installing a fixed panel with emergency exit door, installation of glazed canopies to the pedestrian entrances, installation of protection bollards to the goods doors, change of roof covering to Euroclad Elite roofing with standing seam to the front elevation and standard profile to the rear, creation of a services cupboard to the left of the substation, change to the surround of the substation doors to brick, change of the substation doors to 4-leaf, and installation of ventilation louvres to the front elevation.
